00037   LaGrassProcess::LaGrassProcess(LaRasterInfo theRasterInfo, QPair<int, int> theCoordinates, QPair<QMap<QString, int>, QMap<QString, int> > & thePairOfAreaTargetMaps, QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00038 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00039 {
00040     //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00041   setupUi(this);
00042   readSettings();
00043 
00044     //connect ( buttonBox, SIGNAL(rejected()), this, SLOT(reject()) );
00045 
00046   mAnimalAreaTargetsMap = thePairOfAreaTargetMaps.first;
00047   mCropAreaTargetsMap = thePairOfAreaTargetMaps.second;
00048   mDEM = (theRasterInfo.first).first;
00049   mMapset = (theRasterInfo.first).second;
00050   mCommonCropRaster = (theRasterInfo.second).first;
00051   mCommonGrazingRaster = (theRasterInfo.second).second;
00052   mCoordinates = theCoordinates;
00053   lblGraphic->setScaledContents(true);
00054   lblPreview->setScaledContents(true);
00055   pbarTarget->setRange(0,100);
00056   pbarTarget->setValue(0);
00057   pbarOverall->setRange(0,100);
00058   pbarOverall->setValue(0);
00059   lblCurrentArea->setText("0");
00060   lblAreaTarget->setText(0);
00061 }

00063 LaGrassProcess::~LaGrassProcess()
00064 {
00065   writeSettings();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void LaGrassProcess::readSettings()
00069 {
00070   QSettings mySettings;
00071   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00072   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(200, 400)).toSize();
00073   resize(size);
00074   move(pos);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void LaGrassProcess::writeSettings()
00078 {
00079   QSettings mySettings;
00080   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00081   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00082 }

00084 void LaGrassProcess::accept()
00085 {
00086     // first, we need to remove the items from the map
00087     // that use Common Land, and then determine the
00088     // number of items in the map to set the overall
00089     // progress bar (number of steps)
00090   float myMinimumCost = 0.;
00091   tbGrass->setText("Creating Cost Surface Raster...");
00092   tbGrass->repaint();
00093   toggleBusyProgressBar(true);
00094   int myOverallProgress = 1;
00095 
00096   LaMainForm myMainForm;
00097   QMapIterator<QString, int > myCropCounter(mCropAreaTargetsMap);
00098   while (myCropCounter.hasNext())
00099   {
00100     myCropCounter.next();
00101     if (myCropCounter.key() != "CommonTarget")
00102     {
00103         // check for use of common targets
00104         // if it does not use common target then add to count
00105       QString myCropGuid = myCropCounter.key();
00106       QString myCropParameterGuid = myMainForm.getMatchingCropParameterGuid(myCropGuid);
00107       LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00108       bool myCommonLandUsed = myCropParameter.useCommonLand();
00109       if (myCommonLandUsed)
00110       {
00111         qDebug() << "removing from area map: "  << myCropGuid;
00112         mCropAreaTargetsMap.remove(myCropGuid);
00113       }
00114     }
00115   }
00116   QMapIterator<QString, int > myAnimalCounter(mAnimalAreaTargetsMap);
00117   while (myAnimalCounter.hasNext())
00118   {
00119     myAnimalCounter.next();
00120     if (myAnimalCounter.key() != "CommonTarget")
00121     {
00122         // check for use of common targets
00123         // if it does not use common target then add to count
00124       QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalCounter.key();
00125       QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myMainForm.getMatchingAnimalParameterGuid(myAnimalGuid);
00126       LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00127       bool myCommonLandUsed = myAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand();
00128       if (myCommonLandUsed)
00129       {
00130         qDebug() << "removing from area map: "  << myAnimalGuid;
00131         mAnimalAreaTargetsMap.remove(myAnimalGuid);
00132       }
00133     }
00134   }
00135 
00136 
00137   int myNumberOfSearches = mCropAreaTargetsMap.size() + mAnimalAreaTargetsMap.size();
00138   setPbarOverallRange(myNumberOfSearches);
00139 
00140     // create cost surface maps
00141 
00142   LaGrass myGrass;
00143   int myEasting = mCoordinates.first;
00144   int myNorthing = mCoordinates.second;
00145   myGrass.makeWalkCost(myEasting, myNorthing, mDEM);
00146 
00147   tbGrass->append("Cost Surface Generation complete.");
00148   tbGrass->repaint();
00149 
00150   QMapIterator<QString, int > myCropIterator(mCropAreaTargetsMap);
00151   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00152   {
00153     myCropIterator.next();
00154     if (myCropIterator.key() != "CommonTarget")
00155     {
00156       LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropIterator.key());
00157 
00158         // set the images and area target label
00159         lblGraphic->setPixmap(myCrop.imageFile());
00160         lblGraphic->repaint();
00161           //lblPreview->setPixmap(convertedRasterFile);
00162           //lblPreview->repaint();
00163         lblAreaTarget->setText("Target:\n" + QString::number(myCropIterator.value()));
00164         lblAreaTarget->repaint();
00165 
00166       int myAreaTarget = myCropIterator.value();
00167       QString myName = myCrop.name();
00168 
00169       LaMainForm myMainForm;
00170       QString myCropParameterGuid = myMainForm.getMatchingCropParameterGuid(myCropIterator.key());
00171 
00172       LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00173       QString myCropRasterFile = myCropParameter.rasterName();
00174 
00175       setPbarTargetRange(17);
00176         //for (int i=0; i<18; i++)
00177         //{
00178         //  pbarTarget->setValue(i);
00179         //}
00180         // go analyse the stuff...
00181       qDebug() << "myAreaTarget: " << myAreaTarget;
00182       qDebug() << "myName: " << myName;
00183       analyseModel(myName, myCropRasterFile, myAreaTarget);
00184       updateOverallProgress(myOverallProgress);
00185       myOverallProgress++;
00186     }
00187     else
00188     {
00189         //do stuff for commonTarget
00190         QString myCommonPixMap = ":/commonTarget.png";
00191         lblGraphic->setPixmap(myCommonPixMap);
00192         lblGraphic->repaint();
00193         lblAreaTarget->setText("Target:\n" + QString::number(myCropIterator.value()));
00194         lblAreaTarget->repaint();
00195       myMinimumCost = analyseModel("commonCrop", mCommonCropRaster, myCropIterator.value());
00196       updateOverallProgress(myOverallProgress);
00197       myOverallProgress++;
00198       myGrass.createInverseMask(myMinimumCost, mCommonCropRaster);   // creates laLeftOver
00199 
00200     }
00201   }
00202 
00203   QMapIterator<QString, int > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalAreaTargetsMap);
00204   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00205   {
00206     myAnimalIterator.next();
00207     if (myAnimalIterator.key() != "CommonTarget")
00208     {
00209       LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalIterator.key());
00210 
00211         // set the images and area target label
00212         lblGraphic->setPixmap(myAnimal.imageFile());
00213         lblGraphic->repaint();
00214           //lblPreview->setPixmap(convertedRasterFile);
00215           //lblPreview->repaint();
00216         lblAreaTarget->setText("Target:\n" + QString::number(myAnimalIterator.value()));
00217         lblAreaTarget->repaint();
00218       QString myName = myAnimal.name();
00219       LaMainForm myMainForm;
00220       QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myMainForm.getMatchingAnimalParameterGuid(myAnimalIterator.key());
00221       LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00222       QString myAnimalRasterFile = myAnimalParameter.rasterName();
00223       setPbarTargetRange(17);
00224 
00225         // go analyse the stuff...
00226       int myAreaTarget = myAnimalIterator.value();
00227         // hard coded to add the leftover mask to the common animal mask
00228       myGrass.mergeMaps(myAnimalRasterFile);
00229 
00230       analyseModel(myName, "laCombinedMasks@" + mMapset, myAreaTarget);
00231       updateOverallProgress(myOverallProgress);
00232       myOverallProgress++;
00233     }
00234     else
00235     {
00236         //do stuff for commonTarget
00237       myGrass.mergeMaps(mCommonGrazingRaster);   // creates laCombinedMasks
00238         QString myCommonPixMap = ":/commonTarget.png";
00239         lblGraphic->setPixmap(myCommonPixMap);
00240         lblGraphic->repaint();
00241         lblAreaTarget->setText("Target:\n" + QString::number(myAnimalIterator.value()));
00242         lblAreaTarget->repaint();
00243         // hard coded to add the leftover mask to the common animal mask
00244       analyseModel("commonGrazing", "laCombinedMasks@" + mMapset, myAnimalIterator.value());
00245       updateOverallProgress(myOverallProgress);
00246       myOverallProgress++;
00247     }
00248   }
00249   toggleBusyProgressBar(false);
00250 }

00252 void LaGrassProcess::setPbarTargetRange(int theTarget)
00253 {
00254   pbarTarget->reset();
00255   pbarTarget->setRange(0,theTarget);
00256   pbarTarget->setValue(0);
00257   lblAreaTarget->setText("Target:\n" + QString::number(theTarget));
00258 }

00261 {
00262   pbarOverall->reset();
00263   pbarOverall->setRange(0,theOverall);
00264   pbarOverall->setValue(0);
00265 }

00298 void LaGrassProcess::toggleBusyProgressBar(bool theStatus)
00299 {
00300   switch (theStatus)
00301   {
00302     case true:    // turn it on
00303                   // set the progress bar to move (min,max = 0,0)
00304                   //pbarBusy->setMinimum(0);
00305                 pbarBusy->setMaximum(0);
00306                 pbarBusy->repaint();
00307                 break;
00308     case false:   // shut it off
00309                   // set the progress bar to not move (min,max = 0,1)
00310                   //pbarBusy->setMinimum(0);
00311                 pbarBusy->setMaximum(1);
00312                 break;
00313   }
00314 }
00315 
00316 float LaGrassProcess::analyseModel(QString theItemName, QString theRasterMask, int theAreaTarget)
00317 {
00318   LaGrass myGrass;
00319    float myFirst = 0;
00320    float myLast=120000;
00321    int myAreaTarget = theAreaTarget;
00322    float myCurrentlyContainedArea = 0.0;
00323    int myPrecision = 5;   // change this to real value
00324    int myStatusCount = 0;
00325    LandFound mySearchStatus = NotEnough;
00326    float myMid;
00327    setPbarTargetRange(17);
00328 
00329 
00330 
00331    while (myFirst <= myLast)
00332   {
00333     updateCurrentProgress(myStatusCount);
00334     myStatusCount++;
00335     myMid = (myFirst + myLast) / 2.;    // compute mid point.
00336       // reclass with 1 to midpoint and null beyond and then check results
00337       //    echo "0 thru $step = 1" | r.reclass input=$cost output=cost.reclass --o
00338       //    r.stats -n -a fs=- input=cost.reclass > $TMP1
00339     qDebug() << "midpoint value: " << myMid;
00340     qDebug() << "midpoint valueas int: " << static_cast<int>(myMid);
00341 
00342     myGrass.reclass("laWalkCost", static_cast<int>(myMid));   // makes a raster called laCostMapReclassed
00343     myGrass.createMask("laCostMapReclassed" , theRasterMask);   // creates tmpMask
00344     myCurrentlyContainedArea = myGrass.getArea("tmpMask");
00345       // find out if the contained area is within acceptable range
00346 
00347     mySearchStatus = getSearchStatus(static_cast<int>(myCurrentlyContainedArea), myAreaTarget, myPrecision);
00348 
00349     switch (mySearchStatus)
00350     {
00351       case NotEnough:
00352             qDebug() << "Not Close Enough. (low) Current is " << myCurrentlyContainedArea << "Needed: " << myAreaTarget;
00353             myFirst = myMid + 1.;    // repeat search in top half.
00354             break;;
00355       case TooMuch:
00356             qDebug() << "Not Close Enough. (high) Current is " << myCurrentlyContainedArea << "Needed: " << myAreaTarget;
00357             myLast = myMid - 1.;   // repeat search in bottom half.
00358             break;
00359       case FoundTarget:
00360               // found it. break out of loop   //  ///
00361               // copy final raster to permanentRaster
00362             qDebug() << "TARGET FOUND!  Current is " << myCurrentlyContainedArea << "Actual Needed: " << myAreaTarget;
00363             qDebug() << "which falls within the precision range";
00364 
00365             QString myRasterName = generateFilename(theItemName, myMid, myAreaTarget);
00366             myGrass.copyMap("tmpMask", myRasterName);
00367 
00368             updateCurrentProgress(myStatusCount);
00369             myFirst = myLast+1.;
00370             break;
00371     }
00372 
00373   }
00374   return myMid;
00375 }
00376 
00377 QString LaGrassProcess::generateFilename(QString theItemName, float theExtent, int theAreaTarget)
00378 {
00379   QString myPeriod="";
00380   QString myPopulation="";
00381   QString myDietRatio="";
00382 
00383   QString myPeriodSetting = cbPeriod->currentText();
00384   QString myPopulationSetting = cbPopulation->currentText();
00385   QString myDietRatioSetting = cbDietRatio->currentText();
00386   QString myOtherText = leOtherText->text();
00387 
00388   if (myPeriodSetting == "Chalcolithic") {myPeriod = "Chalco";}
00389   else if (myPeriodSetting == "EEB1") {myPeriod = "EEB1";}
00390   else if (myPeriodSetting == "LEB1") {myPeriod = "LEB1";}
00391 
00392   if (myPopulationSetting == "Max") {myPopulation = "MaxPop";}
00393   else if (myPopulationSetting == "Min") {myPopulation = "MinPop";}
00394 
00395   if (myDietRatioSetting == "70:30") {myDietRatio = "DR7030";}
00396   else if (myDietRatioSetting == "80:20") {myDietRatio = "DR8020";}
00397   else if (myDietRatioSetting == "90:10") {myDietRatio = "DR9010";}
00398 
00399   QString myExtent = QString::number(static_cast<int>(theExtent));
00400   QString myArea = QString::number(theAreaTarget);
00401   
00402   QString myDescriptor = myOtherText + myPeriod + myPopulation + myDietRatio;
00403   QString myRasterName = theItemName + "_" + myDescriptor + "Extent" + myExtent + "Area" + myArea;
00404   
00405   return myRasterName;
00406 }
00407 
00408 LandFound LaGrassProcess::getSearchStatus(int theCurrentlyContainedArea, int theAreaTarget, int thePrecision)
00409 {
00410   LandFound myStatus;
00411   float myPrecision=5.;    //get the real value for precision
00412   float myAcceptableRange=(theAreaTarget*myPrecision*0.01)/2.0;
00413   float myMinimumAcceptable = theAreaTarget - myAcceptableRange;
00414   float myMaximumAcceptable = theAreaTarget + myAcceptableRange;
00415   qDebug() << "myAcceptableRange:" << myAcceptableRange;
00416   qDebug() << "myMinimumAcceptable:" << myMinimumAcceptable;
00417   qDebug() << "myMaximumAcceptable:" << myMaximumAcceptable;
00418   if (theCurrentlyContainedArea >= myMinimumAcceptable)
00419     {
00420       qDebug() << "the currently contained area of " << theCurrentlyContainedArea << "is >= the MIN target of " << theAreaTarget;
00421       if (theCurrentlyContainedArea <= myMaximumAcceptable)
00422       {
00423       qDebug() << "the currently contained area of " << theCurrentlyContainedArea << "is also <= the MAX target of " << theAreaTarget;
00424         myStatus = FoundTarget;
00425       }
00426       else
00427       {
00428       qDebug() << "the currently contained area of " << theCurrentlyContainedArea << "is > the MAX target of " << theAreaTarget;
00429         myStatus = TooMuch;
00430       }
00431 
00432 
00433     }
00434   else
00435     {
00436       qDebug() << "the currently contained area of " << theCurrentlyContainedArea << "is < the MIN target of " << theAreaTarget;
00437       myStatus = NotEnough;
00438     }
00439 
00440   return myStatus;
00441 }
